"aththa mata kalin kollek hitiya.kollek nemeyi kollo hitiya.mage prema sambandakan godak dura diga giya eewa.kanyabhawaya kiyana bammen midena kota mama ee lewal wath karala naha.eeth eeka mata kawadawath prashnayak une naha.mokada mama kawada hari bandinne bandinna kalin mageth ekka oya kriyawe yedena ekek ekkaya kiyala mata wishwasayak thibuna.mama harima sahalluwen jiwath une.nogalapimak dakkama ee kolla atha arala wena ekek ekka yalu wenna mata puluwan kama thibuna.kampas eke premayath kalin eewa wagema thamayi.athin allan paya ganan katha kara kara innawa, imbainawa, sansargayen awasan wenawa.aayeth mula indan.
